### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	DKINSTALL(https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r21e-windows-x86_64.zip android-ndk-r21e android-ndk-r21e)
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r21e" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r21e)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r21e-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r21e-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	SET(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r21e")
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r21e)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r21e-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r21e-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	SET(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r21e")
ENDIF()
